text: Summary of Cache Parameters Based on Computer Systems: A Programmer’s Perspective (3rd edition) Figure 6.26. For use only for CPSC 313 activities. Parameter Description S = 2 s Number of sets E Number of cache slots per set B = 2 b Block size or cache line size (bytes) m = log2 (M ) Number of physical (main memory) address bits M = 2 m Maximum number of unique memory addresses s = log2 (S) Number of set index bits or index bits b = log2 (B) Number of block index bits or offset bits t = m − (s + b) Number of tag bits C = B × E × S Cache size (bytes), not including metadata such as valid, tag, and dirty bits 1
